name:
A Little Bit of...
All Time Classics™:
Strategy Games
formal_name:
A Little Bit of...
All Time Classics™:
Strategy Games
description:
Enjoy some of the world’s favourite games together in one handy collection, playable with Touch Screen controls, and with support for up to four players.

A Little Bit of... All Time Classics: Strategy Games features five classic games famed for their strategic play: Backgammon, Field Tactics, Turncoat, Connect Five and Grid Attack.

Play solo against computer opponents, learn the rules with in-depth instructions, and play with friends wirelessly (only one player needs a copy of the game). You can even send a game to a friend’s Nintendo DS or Nintendo DSi as a gift (until they switch off their system).

Please note that elements of this software may have been featured in previously-released software.
